long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avion Rewards ShopPlus is your free, easy-to-use shopping companion. As an Avion Rewards member, your access is guaranteed!

Add it now and get ready for the best cash back deals - automatically delivered to you. 

üõçÔ∏è All you do is shop - and load. Avion Rewards Shop Plus will find and show you cash back offers*. It takes only one click to start saving. 
üí∞ Great cash back deals. Get up to 40% cash back ** when you shop online and make eligible purchases. 
üéâ 2,000+ brands. Find deals from your favourite retailers, including Ticketmaster, DoorDash, Gap, Sephora and Dyson. 
‚úÖ Cash back in your account. Shop with confidence, earn with peace of mind. Powered by RBC. 
‚ù§Ô∏è Real savings. Avion Rewards ShopPlus helps Canadians - just like you - save with cash back!

Don't leave cash back behind. Add Avion Rewards ShopPlus to your browser to start saving now!

Note: 

*Avion Rewards ShopPlus uses a merchant affiliate program to give you access to  cash back offers. RBC (Avion Rewards) doesn't earn commissions when you make eligible purchases with these merchants. 

**Cash back percentage varies by brand and is subject to change.
